thread.title: Wylie Dufresne, Famed Molecular Chef, Reinvents the Doughnut

author: Jeanette Settembre
title: Wylie Dufresne, Famed Molecular Chef, Reinvents the Doughnut
text:
One of New York’s most celebrated and innovative chefs is whipping up a new career selling doughnuts.
Wylie Dufresne, who became a leading practitioner of a scientific cooking style known as molecular gastronomy in the 2000s, now slings cake doughnuts, crullers and coffee at Du’s Donuts inside the William Vale Hotel in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.
Mr....
